00069                 public static function get_spam_signature($text)
00070                 {
00071                         $pattern = preg_replace('/[a-z0-9]+/i', 'a', $text);
00072                         $signature = md5($pattern);
00073                         return $signature;
00074                 }

00081                 public static function check_spam_signature($text)
00082                 {
00083                         global $db;
00084                         
00085                         $signature = self::get_spam_signature($text);
00086                         
00087                         $sig_factory = new SpamSignature();
00088                         $matches = $sig_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`signature` = '{$db->escape($signature)}'"));
00089                         
00090                         return (count($matches) > 0);
00091                 }
